short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly get Wayfair reviews and easily save them in a CSV file. Export comments, ratings, variations, images, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Features

- Extract reviews from Wayfair™ products, including content, ratings, images, etc.
- Provide support for sorting and exporting through keyword filtering.
- Support Wayfair™ websites for the US, Germany, Canada, and the UK.
- Allow direct export of review listings to CSV files.

# How to use?

- Open any Wayfair™ product page.
- Click on this Chrome extension app.
- Click the "Export Reviews" button located next to the review count to initiate the retrieval of reviews.
- Allow the process to finish, and the data will be automatically downloaded in a CSV file.

# Is it Free?

Indeed, Wayfair™ Reviews Exporter | Images is available for free. You can access the basic features and choose to upgrade for more functionalities.

# Data Privacy

All data processing occurs locally on your computer, and it never traverses our servers.

# Disclaimer

Wayfair™ is a trademark owned by Wayfair™ Inc. Wayfair™ Reviews Exporter | Images has no affiliation, endorsement, sponsorship, or direct relation to Wayfair™, Inc., its affiliates, or subsidiaries.
